attributes.additional_details:
Eg: allow students to take their reading books into the exam instead of having to memorise quotes
Do not include the topics which have only been covered during the last 12 months 
Narrow down the topics which may be covered in the exams
attributes.background: I would like next years exams to be fairly adapted to reflect the 7 months of learning that has been missed over the past 12 months.
